title: Asante (1905) New Testament (Fante - Tshi)
description: Asante translation of the New Testament published by the British and Foreign Bible Society in 1905. Asante is a minority language spoken in Ghana.

language.name: Akan
language.area: Asante are south central, Ashanti Province; Akuapem are southeast, north of Accra; Fante are south central, between Winneba, Takoradi, and Obuasi.
